description: Canonical registry for noa CLI, automation, and plugin integrations.

tools.name: Kernel Metrics Snapshot
tools.summary: Collects a focused metrics window from kernel telemetry exporters.
tools.description: Emits an aggregated telemetry snapshot for the selected kernel component, sourced from offline-first collectors.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Kernel component or subsystem to sample (kernel, io, process, sandbox).

parameters.name: window
parameters.description: Time window in seconds to aggregate telemetry across.

side_effects.description: Reads counters from the offline metrics cache to avoid production scraping.
side_effects.mitigation: Cache snapshots rotate every 15 minutes; no live scraping occurs.

outputs.description: Structured telemetry snapshot keyed by metric and component.

cli_mappings.description: Display the current kernel metrics snapshot.

tools.name: Automation Plan Executor
tools.summary: Runs an approved automation plan with safety gates and ledger output.
tools.description: Executes an automation plan from the workflow engine, honoring approvals and budget constraints before producing an evidence ledger receipt.

parameters.name: plan_id
parameters.description: Identifier for the automation plan stored in the workflow graph.

parameters.name: dry_run
parameters.description: Whether to perform a dry-run evaluation without committing outputs.

side_effects.description: Appends an execution receipt to the workflow evidence ledger.
side_effects.mitigation: Ledger writes are idempotent via plan-id deduplication.

side_effects.description: May trigger downstream automation hooks defined in the plan nodes.
side_effects.mitigation: Dry run mode allows preview without executing actions.

outputs.description: Workflow execution receipt with approvals, actions, and resulting artifacts.

cli_mappings.description: Execute an automation plan with optional dry-run mode.

tools.name: Security Posture Scan
tools.summary: Performs a targeted security scan across runtime manifests and dependencies.
tools.description: Uses the CRC engine to inspect manifests, SBOM artifacts, and recent diffs to produce a consolidated security posture report.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of the security scan (runtime, services, agents, full).

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Commit or timestamp boundary to limit the scan.

side_effects.description: Reads SBOM and vulnerability databases from the offline cache.
side_effects.mitigation: Cache is refreshed by nightly automation; no network calls performed.

outputs.description: Consolidated security scan findings grouped by severity and component.

cli_mappings.description: Run the security posture scan across the selected scope.

tools.name: Collaboration Review Packager
tools.summary: Bundles workflow state, telemetry, and evidence into a shareable review packet.
tools.description: Aggregates workflow tasks, evidence ledger entries, and observability snapshots into a single collaboration artifact for asynchronous review.

parameters.name: workflow_id
parameters.description: Workflow identifier to package for review.

parameters.name: include_logs
parameters.description: Whether to include sanitized execution logs in the package.

side_effects.description: Writes a packaged artifact to the collaboration exchange cache.
side_effects.mitigation: Artifacts expire after 48 hours via retention policy.

outputs.description: Metadata about the generated collaboration package, including handoff location.

cli_mappings.description: Prepare a collaboration review package for the provided workflow.

tools.name: Plugin Catalog Descriptor
tools.summary: Describes plugin integration points and scaffolding tasks based on the registry.
tools.description: Reads the canonical registry to highlight plugin extension points, SDK scaffolding commands, and matching API definitions for rapid onboarding.

parameters.name: surface
parameters.description: Surface to focus on (cli, api, automation, all).

side_effects.description: Reads the tool registry and plugin scaffolding manifests.
side_effects.mitigation: Read-only access; writes are not performed.

outputs.description: Plugin scaffolding recommendations with CLI and API entry points.

cli_mappings.description: Describe plugin scaffolding tasks for a given surface.
